typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		rental_id as string,
		rental_date as string,
		inventory_id as string,
		customer_id as string,
		return_date as string,
		staff_id as string,
		last_update as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> RentalCSV
source(output(
		customer_id as string,
		store_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		address_id as string,
		activebool as string,
		create_date as string,
		last_update as string,
		active as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CustomerCSV
RentalCSV, CustomerCSV join(RentalCSV@customer_id == CustomerCSV@customer_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(not(isNull(CustomerCSV@customer_id))) ~> Filter1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		rental_id,
		rental_date,
		inventory_id,
		customer_id = RentalCSV@customer_id,
		return_date,
		staff_id,
		store_id,
		first_name,
		last_name,
		email,
		address_id,
		active
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForSink
SelectForSink sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
